name: ANCOM 23
notes:
Thanks to Jack Gutter and 'laxingirl' for providing this information. The ANCOM 23 has the appearance of a smaller version of the THUNDERBIRD. Some photos to follow.
This from 'laxingirl': "From what we have been able to piece together, they were built in Ontario, outside of Toronto, but it seems Ancom went out of business after 1973. The molds were sold to a group of CF soldiers and they made a few of them up in Ottawa for a while..."
Images have been promised.
